author: jwoolley
msg: s/malloc/apr_sms_malloc/; s/free/apr_sms_free/; Add in a temporary global
apr_sms_std instance in the buckets code that all buckets will use to get
their memory from.  Add an apr_sms_t* to the apr_bucket struct and various
private structures so that the apr_bucket_foo_make() functions and the
foo_destroy() functions know which SMS to use.  No API changes yet.

author: ianh
msg: fix compiler warnings by declaring functions.

author: fielding
msg: Crikey, this should be in the developer FAQ... if you need a for loop in
a shell script that uses an autoconf or makefile variable to set its
value, please look at all of the other places where it is done right
before committing something which is just wrong.
